title: Chinese five spice chicken stir fry
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons sesame oil', '2 tablespoons light soy sauce', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 inch piece root ginger, peeled and grated', '2 to 3 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 teaspoon Chinese five spice powder', '500g chicken (any cut, I prefer thighs)', 'seasoned plain flour', 'vegetable oil', '1 red pepper, sliced', '4 chestnut mushrooms, sliced', '4 spring onions, sliced']
